titleStmt.title: An English ballad in answer to Mr. Despreaux's Pindarique ode on the taking of Namure
titleStmt.author: Prior, Matthew, 1664-1721.
Boileau Despréaux, Nicolas, 1636-1711. Ode sur la prise de Namur.

notesStmt.note: Text of Boileau-Despréaux's "Ode sur la prise de Namur" in French, and Prior's ballad, on opposite pages; paged in duplicate.
Attributed to Matthew Prior. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
